theRose:Workout.NAME: Workout
theRose:Workout.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Heal !theRose:SecondMagic! HP. NL Exhaust.

theRose:FlipperFlap.NAME: Flipper Flap
theRose:FlipperFlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Gain !M! Flight. NL Exhaust.

theRose:TemperTantrum.NAME: Temper Tantrum
theRose:TemperTantrum.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add !M! Flipper Flap into your hand.

theRose:BeakDive.NAME: Beak Dive
theRose:BeakDive.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played when in Flight. Deal !D! damage. Lose all Flight.

theRose:Peck.NAME: Peck
theRose:Peck.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable. If in Flight, apply !theRose:SecondMagic! Weak. Deal damage equal to your current Flight.

theRose:UberDishes.NAME: UberDishes
theRose:UberDishes.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! random Food items in your discard pile.
theRose:UberDishes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create !M! random Upgraded Food items in your discard pile.

theRose:EnergyDrink.NAME: Energy Drink
theRose:EnergyDrink.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Energy. Gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Flight. NL Exhaust.

theRose:Donut.NAME: Donut
theRose:Donut.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 Card. Lose !theRose:SecondMagic! Flight. NL Exhaust.

theRose:FriedChicken.NAME: Fried Chicken
theRose:FriedChicken.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

theRose:Sushi.NAME: Sushi
theRose:Sushi.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

theRose:Hamburger.NAME: Hamburger
theRose:Hamburger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. This cards counts as 3 Food items. NL Exhaust.

theRose:HungryForm.NAME: Hungry Form
theRose:HungryForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Eat !M! random Food items.

theRose:Reorder.NAME: Reorder
theRose:Reorder.DESCRIPTION: Return all Exhausted Food items to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theRose:BellyBump.NAME: Belly Bump
theRose:BellyBump.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 2 times the number of Food items eaten this combat. Set the counter to a half.
theRose:BellyBump.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 3 times the number of Food items eaten this combat. Set the counter to a half.

theRose:SharingIsCaring.NAME: Sharing Is Caring
theRose:SharingIsCaring.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity for the number of Food items in your hand. Exhaust all Food items.

theRose:ChefRose.NAME: Chef Rose
theRose:ChefRose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Create a random Food item in your hand and discard pile.
theRose:ChefRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Create a random Upgraded Food item to your hand and discard pile.

theRose:TakesiesBacksies.NAME: Takesies Backsies
theRose:TakesiesBacksies.DESCRIPTION: For every !M! Passivity, reduce Passivity by !M!, deal !D! damage, and Eat a random Food item.

theRose:HeadPat.NAME: Head Pat
theRose:HeadPat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Passivity. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

theRose:StayStill.NAME: Stay Still!
theRose:StayStill.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if no Attack was played this turn. Apply !M! Passivity to all enemies. End your turn.

theRose:Sprint.NAME: Sprint
theRose:Sprint.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if no Food item was played this turn and not in Flight. NL Draw !M! Cards.

theRose:EarlyBird.NAME: Early Bird
theRose:EarlyBird.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Flight. Deal damage equal to 2 times your current Flight. Add a random Food item to your hand.
theRose:EarlyBird.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Flight. Deal damage equal to 2 times your current Flight. Add !theRose:SecondMagic! random Food items to your hand.

theRose:Chat.NAME: Chat
theRose:Chat.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity. If an enemy does not intend to attack, apply an extra !theRose:SecondMagic! Passivity.

theRose:AFishADay.NAME: A Fish a Day!
theRose:AFishADay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. At the end of this turn, lose !M! Artifact. Exhaust.

theRose:FoodFight.NAME: Food Fight!
theRose:FoodFight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Eat, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

theRose:Squish.NAME: Squish
theRose:Squish.DESCRIPTION: If your current HP is !M! times the enemy's, set their HP to 0. Exhaust.

theRose:TriplerFlap.NAME: Tripler Flap
theRose:TriplerFlap.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Flipper Flap to your hand.
theRose:TriplerFlap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Upgraded Flipper Flap to your hand.

theRose:FollowUpFlap.NAME: Follow-Up Flap
theRose:FollowUpFlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Add !theRose:SecondMagic! Flipper Flap to your hand.
theRose:FollowUpFlap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Add !theRose:SecondMagic! Upgraded Flipper Flap to your hand.

theRose:FlapFrenzy.NAME: Flap Frenzy
theRose:FlapFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Play a Flipper Flap for each Flipper Flap played this combat. Exhaust.
theRose:FlapFrenzy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play an Upgraded Flipper Flap for each Flipper Flap played this combat. Exhaust.

theRose:FluffyFurFlex.NAME: Fluffy Fur Flex
theRose:FluffyFurFlex.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Thorns. At the start of your next turn, lose !M! Thorns.

theRose:RefrigeratorRaid.NAME: Refrigerator Raid!
theRose:RefrigeratorRaid.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. Fill your hand with Food items. Exhaust.
theRose:RefrigeratorRaid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. Fill your hand with Upgraded Food items. Exhaust.

theRose:Bulking.NAME: Bulking
theRose:Bulking.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Eat this turn, gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Block. Eat !M! random Food item.

theRose:FoodFit.NAME: Food Fit
theRose:FoodFit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. If you have not eaten this combat, deal an extra !M! damage.

theRose:BeakSmash.NAME: Beak Smash!
theRose:BeakSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times your current Flight. Lose all Flight.

theRose:MidflightSnack.NAME: Midflight Snack
theRose:MidflightSnack.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !theRose:SecondMagic! times your current Flight. Create !M! random Food item in your hand. Lose 1 Flight.
theRose:MidflightSnack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !theRose:SecondMagic! times your current Flight. Create !M! random Upgraded Food item in your hand. Lose 1 Flight.

theRose:PermanentChub.NAME: Big Chubster
theRose:PermanentChub.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of Food items eaten this game. Exhaust.

theRose:ShinyBeakAndMe.NAME: Shiny Beak And Me!
theRose:ShinyBeakAndMe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity and !theRose:SecondMagic! Weak to all enemies.

theRose:LucidDream.NAME: Lucid Dream
theRose:LucidDream.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Flight. At the end of your turn, lose !M! Flight. NL Draw 1 card.

theRose:NappyTime.NAME: Nappy Time!
theRose:NappyTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL End your turn.

theRose:Angy.NAME: Angy!
theRose:Angy.DESCRIPTION: If you took damage last turn, gain !M! Strength and Draw 1 card.

theRose:Hibernate.NAME: Hibernate
theRose:Hibernate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Eat !M! random Food items. Next turn, gain 1 [E]. End your turn.

theRose:Thunder.NAME: Thunder
theRose:Thunder.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Whenever you draw this card, deal !D! damage to a random enemy. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

theRose:WitchRose.NAME: Witch Rose
theRose:WitchRose.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! Thunder in your discard pile.

theRose:Overstory.NAME: Overstory
theRose:Overstory.DESCRIPTION: Create an Exhausting Ethereal Beak Dive, Chat, random Food item, and Stay Still! in your hand.
theRose:Overstory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create an Upgraded Exhausting Ethereal Beak Dive, Chat, random Food item, and Stay Still! in your hand.

theRose:TreadmillTreat.NAME: Treadmill Treat
theRose:TreadmillTreat.DESCRIPTION: Draw and discard the top !M! cards in your draw pile. If a card is 0-cost, play it instead.

theRose:StealthRose.NAME: Stealth Rose
theRose:StealthRose.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Block. Draw !M! card. This is unaffected by Flight and Dexterity.
theRose:StealthRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 Block. Draw !M! card. This is unaffected by Flight and Dexterity.

theRose:DivaRose.NAME: Diva Rose
theRose:DivaRose.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity. When this enemy flees, apply its Passivity to all enemies.

theRose:Munch.NAME: Munch
theRose:Munch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, raise your Max Hp by !M!. Exhaust.

theRose:PickyEater.NAME: Picky Eater
theRose:PickyEater.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Create a Donut, Energy Drink, Fried Chicken, Hamburger, or Sushi, in your hand.
theRose:PickyEater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Create an Upgraded Donut, Energy Drink, Fried Chicken, Hamburger, or Sushi, in your hand.

theRose:AgentRose.NAME: Agent Rose
theRose:AgentRose.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! Bomb in your discard pile. Exhaust.
theRose:AgentRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create !M! Upgraded Bomb in your discard pile. Exhaust.

theRose:Bomb.NAME: Agent Rose's Bomb
theRose:Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, reduce its cost by !M!. Create 1 Mission Accomplished in your hand. Exhaust.

theRose:MissionAccomplished.NAME: Mission Accomplished.
theRose:MissionAccomplished.DESCRIPTION: Agent Rose has fulfilled her assigned duties. NL Deal !D! to all enemies. Gain !M! Gold. Exhaust.

theRose:FullForce.NAME: Full Force
theRose:FullForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. If a Food item was eaten this turn, deal and gain !M! extra.

theRose:Temptation.NAME: Temptation
theRose:Temptation.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Dreaded Diet, or Bird Buffet

theRose:DreadedDiet.NAME: Dreaded Diet
theRose:DreadedDiet.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Flight for every Food item in your hand. Exhaust all Food items.

theRose:BirdBuffet.NAME: Bird Buffet
theRose:BirdBuffet.DESCRIPTION: Create a random Food item in your hand for every 1 Flight. Lose all Flight.

theRose:De-FlightfulFlap.NAME: De-Flightful Flap
theRose:De-FlightfulFlap.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Flight for all your cards containing "Flap". Deal !M! damage for every 1 Flight.

theRose:BodySlam.NAME: Body Slam
theRose:BodySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 1/2 of your current HP. Lose HP equal to 1/4 of your current HP.

theRose:Chomp.NAME: Chomp
theRose:Chomp.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 10% (15%) of the enemy's max health. Heal HP equal to half the unblocked damage. Exhaust.

theRose:Betray.NAME: Betray
theRose:Betray.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 2 times an enemy's Passivity. Reduce Passivity to 0. Feel Guilty.

theRose:Reunion.NAME: Reunion
theRose:Reunion.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is bird-like, they flee. Ethereal.

theRose:FlyHigher.NAME: Fly Higher!
theRose:FlyHigher.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Flight. Flight reduces Attack damage taken by 75% this turn. Remove all Block. You cannot gain Block this turn.

theRose:FoodRush.NAME: Food Rush
theRose:FoodRush.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you consume a Food item, have your next Attack deal !M! additional damage.

theRose:Slap.NAME: Slap
theRose:Slap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This card's damage is lowered by !M! this combat.

theRose:OutOfSight.NAME: Out Of Sight
theRose:OutOfSight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Flight, apply !M! Weak to a random enemy.

theRose:BubbleButt.NAME: Bubble Butt
theRose:BubbleButt.DESCRIPTION: Reduce damage taken by !M! for the rest of this combat.

theRose:BellySlide.NAME: Belly Slide
theRose:BellySlide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Apply Vulnerable to all enemies.

theRose:FullOfFlap.NAME: Full Of Flap
theRose:FullOfFlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Deals an additional !theRose:SecondMagic! damage for all your cards containing "Flap"

theRose:FlexedUpFlap.NAME: Flexed Up Flap
theRose:FlexedUpFlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Strength. At the end of your turn, lose !theRose:SecondMagic! Strength.

theRose:FlipperFlexer.NAME: Flipper Flexer
theRose:FlipperFlexer.DESCRIPTION: All cards containing "Flap" deal !M! more damage.

theRose:TestBuff.NAME: Test Buff
theRose:TestBuff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. After you play a card, lose !M! Strength.

theRose:Compost.NAME: Compost
theRose:Compost.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Food item. Gain 1 Energy.

theRose:PenguinBackRide.NAME: Penguin Back Ride
theRose:PenguinBackRide.DESCRIPTION: Apply Passivity equal to !M! times your Flight. Lose all Flight.

theRose:Boost.NAME: Boost
theRose:Boost.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Flight. Draw 3 cards.

theRose:Roost.NAME: Roost
theRose:Roost.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Flight. Gain !B! Block. End your turn.

theRose:GustOfWind.NAME: Gust Of Wind
theRose:GustOfWind.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Flight. Deal !D! damage for every 1 Flight.
